particlerain.title: Particle Rain Configuration
particlerain.PerformanceOptions.descript: Lowering these will reduce the amount of particles on screen, making the game run faster at the cost of more sparse looking effects
particlerain.PerformanceOptions.maxParti: New weather particles will not be spawned if there are this many already in the world.
particlerain.PerformanceOptions.particle: The number of times weather particles will try to spawn per tick during normal rain.
The number of times weather particles will try to spawn per tick during storms.
How many blocks away particles will appear.
particlerain.EffectOptions.description: Turn individual effects on or off.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doSplashParti: Spawn rain splashing on the ground
Appears when rain particles hit a block.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doSmokePartic: Replaces splashing on hot blocks. See 'Spawn Conditions' tab.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doRippleParti: Appears on water source blocks and puddles.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doStreakParti: Spawn streak particles on block edges
Appears on hard surfaces. See 'Spawn Conditions' tab.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doDustParticl: Appears in dry biomes over sandy blocks. See 'Spawn Conditions' tab.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doShrubPartic: Appears in dry biomes over sandy blocks. See 'Spawn Conditions' tab.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doFogParticle: Clouds that drift down with the rain
particlerain.EffectOptions.doMistParticl: Layers of cloud suspended near the ground
particlerain.EffectOptions.doHailParticl: Has a chance to replace rain in cold temperatures.
particlerain.EffectOptions.doSleetPartic: Replaces rain at the border of snowy biomes.
particlerain.SoundOptions.doMaterialSoun: Makes the rain splashing noise match the material of the block it's falling onto.
particlerain.PuddleOptions.updateStep: Amount to update puddle coverage by
particlerain.CompatibilityOptions.tickVa: Controls the default weather sounds and splash particles.
particlerain.CompatibilityOptions.biomeT: Tint water particles with biome colors
Applies color to rain, streaks, drops, and splashes.
particlerain.CompatibilityOptions.tintMi: Mix of color between the biome water color (0) and the biome sky color (100)
particlerain.CompatibilityOptions.always: Particles only. Does not affect gameplay or shading.
particlerain.CompatibilityOptions.yLevel: Makes wind stronger higher up, and disabled below ground level.
particlerain.CompatibilityOptions.syncRe: Disable this if Particle Rain is preventing players from connecting to your LAN server.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.density.des: The frequency the particle will spawn at relative to the overall particle density.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.gravity.des: The strength of gravity on the particle.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.windStrengt: Affects the angle the particle falls at.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.stormWindSt: Affects the angle the particle falls at.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.amount.desc: The number of particles to spawn at once.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.rotationAmo: How much the particle will rotate per tick.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.stormRotati: How much the particle will rotate per tick during thunderstorms.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.opacity.des: How see-through the particles are from fully transparent (0) to fully opaque (100)
particlerain.ParticleOptions.useResource: Uses the resolution of the campfire smoke particle.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.spawnOnGrou: Makes dust blow up from the ground instead of falling from the sky.
particlerain.ParticleOptions.impactEffec: Amount of impact effects to spawn
Controls the amount of ripples, splashes, or smoke that appears when colliding with a block
particlerain.SpawnOptions.useHeightmapTe: Prevents snow falling where it should be raining in biomes where the weather can vary by height, such as the Windswept Hills.
particlerain.SpawnOptions.canSpawnAboveC: Spawn weather particles above cloud height
particlerain.SpawnOptions.cloudHeight: The height above which particles should not spawn
particlerain.SpawnOptions.dustyBlockTags: Spawn dust on blocks tagged asï¼š
particlerain.SpawnOptions.openWiki: View block tags on Minecraft Wiki
